category.name: Product Structure.Where Used
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: IsWhereUsedConfiguredModeEnabled
preference.preference_description:
Monitors the Where Used Configured Parent option in the Impact Analysis view.
Note: This preference is not for customer customization. The value for this preference is set by the system at the user level. This preference informs the Graphics Panel the state of "Configure Parent And Child" option.
